dn22:8.1: kaṅkehi vā khajjamānaṃ sunakhehi vā khajjamānaṃ byagghehi vā khajjamānaṃ dīpīhi vā khajjamānaṃ siṅgālehi vā khajjamānaṃ → suvānehi vā khajjamānaṃ sigālehi vā khajjamānaṃ (sī1, syā1-3, kaṃ), supāṇehi vā khajjamānaṃ sigālehi vā khajjamānaṃ (pā1)
dn22:9.4: aññena phāsukaṭṭhikaṃ aññena piṭṭhiṭṭhikaṃ aññena khandhaṭṭhikaṃ → aññena kaṭaṭṭhikaṃ aññena piṭṭhaṭṭhikaṃ aññena kaṇḍakaṭṭhikaṃ aññena phāsukaṭṭhikaṃ aññena uraṭṭhikaṃ aññena aṃsaṭṭhikaṃ aññena bāhuṭṭhikaṃ (syā1-3, kaṃ), aññena kaṭiṭṭhikaṃ → aññena piṭṭhiṭṭhikaṃ aññena kaṭaṭṭhikaṃ aññena khandhaṭṭhikaṃ aññena gīvaṭṭhikaṃ (sī1)
dn22:18.2: dukkho → appiyehi …pe… vippayogo dukkhotipāṭho ceva taṃniddeso ca katthaci na dissati, aṭṭha­ka­thā­yampi taṃsaṃvaṇṇanā
